dct_description_sm: Coloured map of the Colony of Natal showing geological formations and mission stations.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Feet" and "Geogl. Miles."
Inset map: "Section, along the main Road from the Drakenberg [sic] at Van Reenen Pass, to the Sea at Bluff Point, Port Natal."
Note on map: "Mission stations are shewn thus ... +. The figures in the section shew the heights above the Sea Level, in feet."
dct_publisher_sm: Compiled in the Surveyor General's Office
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
